name: @iterables/roundrobin
description: given a set of iterables, take from each one in order until all are exhausted

scripts.update-contrib: weallcontribute -o . && git add CONTRIBUTING.md && git commit -m 'docs(contributing): updated CONTRIBUTING.md'
scripts.update-coc: weallbehave -o . && git add CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md && git commit -m 'docs(coc): updated CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md'
scripts.prerelease: npm run update-contrib && npm run update-coc

author: Chris Dickinson <chris@neversaw.us> (http://neversaw.us/)
